sub_title: Molecular Biology & Genomics | CRISPR | R&D Innovation | Plant biotechnology | Team & Project Management
summary:
Highly accomplished, insightful, and well-organized research professional with expertise in plant biotechnology, genome editing, cell biology, and cell cycle by extensive exposure to state-of-the-art laboratories throughout Brazil, Europe, and the USA. Extensive research experience legalized by publications in high-impact factor journals. Interested in pursuing a challenging role within a fast-growing organization to continue the enhancement of skills, knowledge and leadership in molecular biology, genome engineering, crop research and data analysis. Exceptional planning and goal-setting skills; combined with expertise in prioritizing projects efficiently; as well as organizational and time management abilities. Readily able to contribute to achieving positive outcomes to reach a common goal.

Specialties: Possess strong decision-making skills and strategically and tactfully problem-resolving capacities. Skilled at conducting regular presentations in laboratory meetings and discussion of results with diverse group of scientists and technicians. Multilingual in Portuguese, English, French, and Spanish. Currently learning Dutch.

profile_positions.description: Worked on the planning and execution of a variety of R&D internal genetic innovation projects.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Specialist Genetics Innovations

profile_positions.description: Led the team responsible for molecular biology work done in HRB (genetic inventory, guide design and in vitro testing, cloning, RNA/DNA isolation, PCR, qPCR). Setup new methodologies, SOPs and analyses (Nanopore sequencing – amplicons and WGS, fluorometric plate quantification, Tapestation and HRM). Responsible to introduce interns to molecular biology methods done in house. Collaborated with the Automation Team for the implementation of protocols in a Hamilton liquid handler robot to accelerate the work in the DNA Operations Team. During this period was also in charge of lab management and ordering of laboratory consumables and equipment.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead DNA Operations

profile_positions.description: Initiated and conducted two client projects, performing the genetic inventory of candidate genes (with and without available sequenced genomes), followed by qPCR analysis on plant material, CRISPR/Cas9 and MAD7 guides design and in vitro/in vivo tests. Worked on a variety of protocols optimizations and developments for RNA/DNA extractions, for the establishment of plant in vitro cultures, for the isolation and transfection of protoplasts with protein, DNA and RNPs.
profile_positions.title: Molecular Biologist
